features.advancedConfigDesc: Enable advanced settings and configuration options
features.qrIntegrationDesc: Add logo to generated QR codes
features.markdownCopyDesc: Use markdown formatting when copying ticket information
features.manualTicketInputDesc: Enable manual ticket ID input in the popup interface

common.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all changes?

validation.prefixAlphanumeric: Prefix must contain only letters and numbers
validation.ticketTypeAlphanumeric: Ticket type must contain only letters and numbers

urls.drupal9Desc: Current CMS system for content management

jira.urlPatternsInfo: Define URL patterns (regex) to help identify JIRA tabs. Used for features like extracting ticket IDs.

urlBuilder.title: URL Builder
urlBuilder.info: Build your custom JIRA URL structure by dragging and dropping components. The pattern defines how your JIRA ticket IDs are converted to URLs.

baseUrlRequired.title: Base URL Required
baseUrlRequired.description: The pattern must include a base URL component

issuePrefixRequired.title: Issue Prefix Required
issuePrefixRequired.description: The pattern must include an issue prefix component

ticketNumberRequired.title: Ticket Number Required
ticketNumberRequired.description: The pattern must include a ticket number component

validTld.title: Valid Top-Level Domain (TLD)
validTld.description: Ensures the domain part ends with a valid TLD (e.g., .com, .org). Checked in URL Preview.

noAdjacentSeparators.title: No Adjacent Separators
noAdjacentSeparators.description: The pattern cannot have two separator components next to each other

noAdjacentRegex.title: No Adjacent Regex Patterns
noAdjacentRegex.description: Cannot place two regex patterns next to each other

noLeadingSymbols.title: No Leading Symbols
noLeadingSymbols.description: The URL cannot start with symbols or dots
